applicationString.name: com.wf.email.template.default.action.complete.body
applicationString.value:
< html> < head> < /head> < body style = "font-family: ibm-plex-sans,HelveticaNeue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">

IBM < span style="font-weight: 600 ">OpenPages

< div style="padding: 8px 24px 32px; background-color: #f3f3f3;">

[ $System Fields: Object Type Label$]:

< a href=" [ $System Fields: Task View URL$ ] "> [ $System Fields:Name$]

[$ApplicationText/app.workflow.workflowInfo.criticality.label$]:

[ $System Workflow Fields: Workflow Criticality$ ] < /p> < /div> < div style="padding: 8px 24px 160px;">

[ $ObjectText/System Fields:Description$]:

[ $System Fields:Description$]

[$ApplicationText/app.workflow.workflowInfo.stage.label$]:

[ $System Workflow Fields: Stage Name$]

[$ApplicationText/app.workflow.transition.status$]:

[ $System Workflow Fields: Workflow Status$ ] < /p> < /div> < hr style = " margin: 0 ; border-bottom: 1px solid #767676" /> < div style="padding: 32px 24px;"> Cet e-mail a été automatiquement généré par [ $ApplicationText/product.name$ ]. < /div> < /body> < /html>

activity.name: Compliance Plan Evidence

activityGuidanceOverrideTextTranslations.name: Please review each Obligation Evaluation and complete the Evidence capture workflow. When all evidence has been captured the

activityGuidanceOverrideTextTranslation.value: Please review each Obligation Evaluation and complete the Evidence capture workflow. When all evidence has been captured the workflow will automatically advance and send the Plan and associated Obligation evaluations to the compliance owner.

activity.name: Compliance Assessment

activityGuidanceOverrideTextTranslations.name: Please review each associated Obligation Evaluation and based on the evidence

activityGuidanceOverrideTextTranslation.value:
Please review each associated Obligation Evaluation and based on the evidence provided please confirm if the Obligation has been Met or Not Met.
When all Obligation Evaluations are complete use the Action button to finalize the compliance assessment.
